featured.text: This tells the retailers of the world that if you want to get into a mother’s 19 , you’ve got to win her daughter over first.

definition.zh_def: 零售商，指直接向消費者銷售商品或服務的商業機構。
definition.en_def: A retailer is a business or person that sells goods or services directly to consumers.
definition.example: The retailer offered a wide range of products to attract more customers.
